type.description: The architecture type for your service. A Static Site is an internet-facing service that is hosted by Amazon S3.

alias.description: HTTPS domain alias of your service.

certificate.description: The ARN for the certificate used for your HTTPS traffic. CloudFront requires imported certificates to be in the us-east-1 region.

http.description: Configuration for incoming traffic to your site.

source.description: The path, relative to your workspace root, to the directory or file to upload to S3.

recursive.description: Whether or not the source directory should be uploaded recursively. Defaults to true for directories.

destination.description: Optional. The subpath to be prepended to your files in your S3 bucket. Default value is .

exclude.description: Optional. Pattern-matched filters to exclude files from upload. Acceptable symbols are: * (matches everything), ? (matches any single character), [sequence] (matches any character in sequence), [!sequence] (matches any character not in sequence).

reinclude.description: Optional. Pattern-matched filters to reinclude files that have been excluded from upload via exclude. Acceptable symbols are: * (matches everything), ? (matches any single character), [sequence] (matches any character in sequence), [!sequence] (matches any character not in sequence).

files.description: Parameters related to your static assets.

environments.description: The environment section lets you override any value in your manifest based on the environment you're in.
